titles.title: Father, Thy name our souls would bless

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Father, Thy name our souls would bless, As children taught by grace, Lift up our hearts in righteousness, And joy before Thy face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Sweet is the confidence Thou giv’st, Though high above our praise; Our hearts resort to where Thou liv’st In heaven’s unclouded rays.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There in the purpose of Thy love, Our place is now prepared, As sons with Him who is above, Who all our sorrows shared.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Eternal ages shall declare The riches of Thy grace, To those who with Thy Son shall share A son’s eternal place.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Absent as yet, we rest in hope, Treading the desert path, Waiting for Him who takes us up Beyond the pow’r of death.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: We joy in Thee, Thy fulness shall Our endless portion be, Like Thine own Son, with whom we’ll dwell In bright eternity.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: O Holy Father, keep us here In that blest name of love, Walking before Thee without fear, Thy perfect will to prove.
